data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.2.5 & iPad Air 2, iOS 11.3 PB 2
data.actual_result: You can see all channels of the servers where writing permission for you aren't denied although you don't have access (read message permission) to them.
data.expected_result: You should only see the channels you have access to.
data.short_description: New share extension shows channel you don't have access to
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Safari for example and open any website - Activate the Discord share extension - Click on share to Discord - Select for `Share in` "Discord Testers" for example - Click on `Share to` - Observe the channels you can see there
